title: Using ABI to reverse decode transaction data
creator: 0x7B082A51792c5528f98dC6F5660bdeB3573766Fd

questions.title: What is the contract method corresponding to this transaction data? Answer format such as “abc(bool,bool,bool)”
What is the value of the first parameter of the method call for this transaction? Answer format such as “12345”, “hi”,"0x123456...1234"
What is the value of the second parameter of the method call for this transaction? Answer format such as “12345”, “hi”,"0x123456...1234"

description: When the contract deployer does not upload the contract source code, can we reverse analyze the contract's method information? By learning about ABI-related knowledge, you can try to reverse parse the execution intent of a transaction by combining public data! Please analyze the intent expressed by this transaction data: 0xa9059cbb0000000000000000000000005494befe3ce72a2ca0001fe0ed0c55b42f8c358f000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000836d54c
